dialogZoeHungry.text: Who cares about food? We need beer!
You got munchies again, we know already.
She told us this exactly five times already.

choices.text: In the fridge is always beer. Let's have a look!
I put all the beer crates in the basement, we should start there.
I've seen a bottle falling down and rolling below the sofa. With enough skill we must be able to rescue it.
Some bottle fell off... lick off those drops...
We should check the beer crate in the kitchen once more for full bottles.
I know my neighbors well. We can easily ask them for some beer.
<Panic and go wild, running in a circle>
I know a buddy from the gas station. He has to help us out!
I am pretty asure of the fact that there remain all sorts of liquors at my chamber. I invite you all to join me.
